Articles.Content:
Me and my sandwich army move onto the small hill. Because it is relatively small and houses a whole army of incredibly ferocious sandwiches, a drastic turn of events may come in place soon, but it is closely monitored by [@greenTurtle1134](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/167701-greenturtle1134/). Anyone who dares try and take it will be utterly annihlated by bloodthirsty sandwiches.

Our hill.

I appear, bringing a new hill. It can't end. It can never end. I've died so many times and I always come back, every time on a different hill, on a different planet. I don't know how it happens, or why. I don't know whether it's a blessing or a curse.

My existential hill.

My army of sandwiches and [@greenTurtle1134](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/167701-greenturtle1134/) look from a distance plotting.

Our battle plans.

I make myself a hill, dig a pit around it, grab some supplies and a minigun and do what ukraininian people always do. 

Everyone can keep their hill. But I'll be waiting for sandwich guy to cross the Rubikon...

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-23T17:29:45Z" title="10/23/2016 05:29  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 23, 2016</time> by ZentroCatson**

I build a mountain. I'll share too.

My mountain.

Since [@icantmakemodels](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/90378-icantmakemodels/) is sharing is mountain, half of my bloodthirsty sandwich army moves onto it. You now have 2,467,938 savage sandwiches as your roommates.

I move into [@icantmakemodels](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/90378-icantmakemodels/) mountain as well.

I bring in a fusion reactor and plenty of H-Bombs.

OK, as the landlord of these mountains, I evict you folk.

My hill, and there are *no* vacancies.

I decide to leave my partisan hideout and capture the mountain. How do I deal with all the sandwiches? Hungry donkeys.

My mountain and partisan hideout.

Half of my sandwich army is left from the other hill. We eat all of your donkeys. With ***<u>NO LEFTOVERS.</u>*** Anyone who dares messes with us will be eaten mercilessly.

Our mountain.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-24T11:30:19Z" title="10/24/2016 11:30  AM" data-short="7 yr">October 24, 2016</time> by The Raging Sandwich**

Oh, look someone left these sandwiches sitting on this hill. I think I'll have one...

![bitten-baloney-sandwich-cheese-38403050.](http://thumbs.dreamstime.com/t/bitten-baloney-sandwich-cheese-38403050.jpg)

\*leaves the hill vacant after having a free lunch...
I move to the mountain next door. I'll share the <u>planet</u> with you, but not the mountain.

I press the "press to randomly generate something to say because I'm too tired" button, and this very sentence is dispensed.

My hill.

I throw the sentence away and put in my own sentence.

My hill and sentence.

I destroy both of your sentences and substitute my own.

My hill and sentences.

Just in case [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/) didn't see it...

![bitten-baloney-sandwich-cheese-38403050.](http://thumbs.dreamstime.com/t/bitten-baloney-sandwich-cheese-38403050.jpg)

It's now my hill, and thanks for lunch... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> 12 minutes ago, adsii1970 said:
> 
> 
> Just in case [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/) didn't see it...
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ![bitten-baloney-sandwich-cheese-38403050.](http://thumbs.dreamstime.com/t/bitten-baloney-sandwich-cheese-38403050.jpg)
> 
> 
> 
> It's now my hill, and thanks for lunch... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
> 

I saw everything else, just not the sandwich. Sometimes my school doesn't allow pictures and sometimes it does. Just weird!

And you're welcome by the way. Were we tasty?

Oh ok then.

I send in a bunch of lads who eat the sandwiches.

My hill.

A hoard of wild buffalos overruns the above poster's hill.

Then I claim it.

My messed up hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-28T16:48:00Z" title="10/28/2016 04:48  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 28, 2016</time> by ZentroCatson**

I rebuild the hill and set up a totalitarian government on it.

My hill.

> 
> 
> On 5/16/2012 at 3:33 AM, vexx32 said:
> 
> 
> I claim an asteroid as a hill.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My rock.
> 

I blow up every hill, and build a giant inpenetrable bunker as a hill.

My lonely ~~hill~~ bunker.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-28T18:24:54Z" title="10/28/2016 06:24  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 28, 2016</time> by The Flame Cat**

I knock on the door, pretending to be a pizza delivery man, but when [@The Flame Cat](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/153296-the-flame-cat/) opens the door, I punch him in the face.

My impenetrable bunker and KO'd [@The Flame Cat](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/153296-the-flame-cat/)

I turn up with a Revive and revive [@The Flame Cat](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/153296-the-flame-cat/).

I then revert the assumed game universe back to KSP, and pick a hill on Dres.

I Build a huge base in the Dres canyon and blow up your hill with a missile.

My canyon.

I realize I can't do this alone, and call for reinforcements from [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/).

My intermission while the Reinforcements follow the Hohmann transfer orbit.
